name: SetPlayerHoldingObject
notes:
Only one object may be attached per player.
 This function is seperate from the CreateObject / CreatePlayerObject pools.
warnings: This function was removed in SA-MP 0.3c. check SetPlayerAttachedObject
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3b and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Attaches an object to a bone.
params_title: (playerid, modelid, bone, Float:fOffsetX, Float:fOffsetY, Float:fOffsetZ, Float:fRotX, Float:fRotY, Float:fRotZ)

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: ID of the player you want to attach the object to.

params_body.name: modelid
params_body.description: The model you want to use.

params_body.name: bone
params_body.description: The bone you want to attach the object to.

params_body.name: fOffsetX
params_body.description: (optional) X axis offset for the object position.

params_body.name: fOffsetY
params_body.description: (optional) Y axis offset for the object position.

params_body.name: fOffsetZ
params_body.description: (optional) Z axis offset for the object position.

params_body.name: fRotX
params_body.description: (optional) X axis rotation of the object.

params_body.name: fRotY
params_body.description: (optional) Y axis rotation of the object.

params_body.name: fRotZ
params_body.description: (optional) Z axis rotation of the object.
